ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: Okies, a) there is no known recipe for a Buryani Bundt Cake, although I ve heard rumors that they can be foraged in Frontier Mountains. b) I saw no ovens in
ygData.messageBody:
Okies,

a) there is no known recipe for a Buryani Bundt Cake, although I've heard
rumors that they can be foraged in Frontier Mountains.

b) I saw no ovens in the mines of Nurga or the Temple of Droga, I think that
the oven will be a container that requires the recipe and the bake to be put
in it and combined.

Draelon Stormsong
(master baker)

-----Original Message-----
From: Katy Westerman [mailto:katyw@...]
Sent: Monday, May 15, 2000 9:40 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie



Hi all. I'm in the midst of trying to do a new quest that has been
found in Firiona Vie. I was hoping that someone here could give me
some help.

If you hail Glinya Sweetpie (she sells baking items and food/water)
she mentions someone named Treekill. If you ask her about him, she
says something to the effect of he's been tring to court her and she
told him to bring her a Burynai Bunt Cake to put him off. Asking her
about the Bunt Cake, she says that there's no such thing.

There is a wandering guard named Scout Treekill. If you hail him, he
doesn't say anything, but the text mentions a helm hanging from his
belt. If you ask him about the helm, he says that he took it from a
bard he had to beat up because he was singing Drow songs. (This has
been mentioned on this list, I believe) Asking him about Glinya
Sweetpie, He says that he's courting her and that she had asked him to
bring her the bunt cake. Asking him about the bunt cake gives you
this text (from my screenshot):

Scout Treekill gets excited. What?!! Do you know how to bake a
Burynai Bunt Cake. Glinya said she would marry me if I baked one!!
She won't let me use her oven so I had to search for one. I finally
located one in some goblin mine, but I can't find the recipe or bake.
Please!! I would give you this bards helm for a Burynai Bunt Cake.

Here is what I have deduced from this passage. The Bunt Cake requires
the baking skill. There is an oven in the Mines of Droga where it
must be baked. Now, I am not a baker, so I'm asking here if anyone
might know the recipe for this? Is there anyone else who might be
working on this that can give me any leads?

Thanks guys.

Robynn Merrilin
Bard at Large on E'ci
Currently: Level 41

--
Katy Westerman Don't lick something unless
katyw@... you really mean it.
http://www.cs.ucr.edu/~katyw -Advice from the Naked
CS/Comp Math Major, UC Riverside Dancing Llama
